    http://www.opentravel.org/OTM/finance/v0

    Facet FormOfPayment_Summary

      • http://www.opentravel.org/OTM/finance/v0:FormOfPayment_ID
        • http://www.opentravel.org/OTM/finance/v0:FormOfPayment_Summary

    • Example XML

      <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="yes"?>

<FormOfPayment costCenterID="I am a tiny string." guaranteeID="I am a short string." guaranteeIndicatorInd="true" guaranteeTypeCode="2" id="formOfPayment_1" paymentTransactionTypeCode="charge" remark="I am a short string." xmlns="http://www.opentravel.org/OTM/finance/v0">
    <Privacy optInDate="2011-01-24T09:45:00" optInStatus="OptedIn" optOutDate="2011-07-04T14:15:00" shareMarketInd="Yes" shareSyncInd="No"/>
</FormOfPayment>

      Example JSON

      {
  "FormOfPaymentSummary" : {
    "@type" : "FormOfPayment",
    "id" : "formOfPayment_1",
    "costCenterID" : "I am a tiny string.",
    "paymentTransactionTypeCode" : "charge",
    "guaranteeTypeCode" : "2",
    "guaranteeID" : "I am a short string.",
    "remark" : "I am a short string.",
    "guaranteeIndicatorInd" : true,
    "Privacy" : {
      "value" : null,
      "shareMarketInd" : "Yes",
      "shareSyncInd" : "No",
      "optInStatus" : "OptedIn",
      "optInDate" : "2011-01-24T09:45:00",
      "optOutDate" : "2011-07-04T14:15:00"
    }
  }
}

      • Property Summary

        Properties 
        Name Description
        Privacy
        Data use and sharing permissions.
        Details
        Type http://www.opentravel.org/OTM/Common/v0:Privacy
        Example Value ???
        Required false
        Pattern N/A
        Max Occurrences 1

      • Attribute Summary

        Attributes 
        Name Description
        costCenterID
        A reference to identify the billing department for allocating cost of travel to company account.
        Details
        Type http://www.opentravel.org/OTM/Common/v0:String_Tiny
        Example Value I am a tiny string.
        Required false
        Pattern N/A
        Max Occurrences 1
        paymentTransactionTypeCode
        This is used to indicate either a charge, reserve (deposit) or refund.
        Details
        Type PaymentTransactionType_Enum
        Example Value charge
        Required false
        Pattern N/A
        Max Occurrences 1
        guaranteeTypeCode
        Used to specify the method of guarantee. Refer to OpenTravel Code List Payment Type (PMT).
        Details
        Type http://www.opentravel.org/OTM/Common/v0:Code_OTA
        Example Value 2
        Required false
        Pattern [0-9A-Z]{1,4}(\.[A-Z]{3}(\.X){0,1}){0,1}
        Max Occurrences 1
        guaranteeID
        Provides the identifier as specified by the GuaranteeTypeCode (e.g., Corporate ID or IATA number).
        Details
        Type http://www.opentravel.org/OTM/Common/v0:String_Short
        Example Value I am a short string.
        Required false
        Pattern N/A
        Max Occurrences 1
        remark
        A remark associated with the payment form.
        Details
        Type http://www.opentravel.org/OTM/Common/v0:String_Short
        Example Value I am a short string.
        Required false
        Pattern N/A
        Max Occurrences 1

      • Attributes inherited from http://www.opentravel.org/OTM/finance/v0:FormOfPayment_ID

        id

      • Indicator Summary

        Indicators 
        Name Description
        guaranteeIndicatorInd
        When true, indicates this represents a guarantee rather than a payment form.
